titleStmt.title: L--gley C--s his lamentation in New-gate who lies there in danger of his ears for printing and publishing sedition and treason, for this five years last past : a song.

notesStmt.note: Includes 3 lines of music following title.
Printed on verso of Wing (2nd ed.) N673, "A new miracle, or Dr. Nomans safe return ..." ; formerly identified as Wing C7690A.
Langley Curtis was a London printer who published works supporting Titus Oates in the Popish Plot.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
